Title: Mars Rover 2.0
Hook: Build an autonomous rover to navigate the Red Planet.
Description: In this mission select design a chassis and write Python code to autonomously detect obstacles.
RealWorld_Description: Use logic found in self-driving cars and warehouse robots.
Challenge_1_Desc: Build a frame that can climb a 30-degree incline.
Challenge_2_Desc: Code the rover to stop 10cm from a wall.
Challenge_3_Desc: Navigate a maze without human input.
